T02D2313:253a-1: sa na sa ra m'a na ni y'a ni ka ra n'a ma sang+g'i ti /
T02D2313:253a-3: 'khor ba las yid nges par 'byung bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i glu //
T02D2313:253a-4: bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2313:253a-5: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2313:253a-7: 'du byed sdug bsngal 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang //
T02D2313:253a-8: sdug bsngal sdug bsngal la sogs brgya rtsa bcu //
T02D2313:253a-9: sdug bsngal kun las skyob par mdzad pa yi //
T02D2313:253a-10: sman pa'i rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2313:253a-11: kye kye kva'i grogs po dag /'khor ba'i rgyu ni nyon mongs pa dang las //
T02D2313:253b-0: nyon mongs khams gsum gnas ni dgu @253b bcu bgyad //
T02D2313:253b-1: zag pa'i chu bo sbyor ba nye bar len //
T02D2313:253b-2: rgyu dang yul dang sbyor ba'i stobs kyis byung //
T02D2313:253b-3: kye kye kva'i grogs po dang //
T02D2313:253b-4: sna tshogs 'di dag las las byung //
T02D2313:253b-5: de yang nyon mongs stobs las byung //
T02D2313:253b-6: dge dang mi dge lung ma bstan //
T02D2313:253b-7: mthong la myong dang skyes nas myong //
T02D2313:253b-8: gzhan du myong dang ma nges pa'i //
T02D2313:253b-10: 'khor ba'i las ni lci gang dang //
T02D2313:253b-11: nye ba gang dang goms pa gang //
T02D2313:253b-12: sngon byas gang yin de las ni //
T02D2313:253b-13: snga ma snga ma rnam smin 'gyur //
T02D2313:253b-14: grogs dag soms shig thog ma med pa nas //
T02D2313:253b-15: ma rig la sogs bcu gcig rga shi'i mtha'//
T02D2313:253b-16: yan lag bcu gnyis cha gsum zo chun tshul //
T02D2313:253b-17: nang gi rten 'brel yang dang yang du 'khor //
T02D2313:253b-18: tshe rabs tshe rabs grangs med de dang der //
T02D2313:253b-19: skye dang rga dang na dang 'chi ba yi //
T02D2313:253b-20: sdug bsngal rnams kyis yang dang yang du gdungs //
T02D2313:253b-22: kyi hud srid pa'i lam gyis dub pa'i 'gron po rnams //
T02D2313:253b-23: sdug bsngal bde bar bzung nas mi skyo ba //
T02D2313:253b-24: khyed yid de la rtag tu chags byed pa //
T02D2313:253b-25: phyugs dang khyad par med par bla ma gsung //
T02D2313:253b-26: bla mas zin pa'i skye bo mkhas pa dag / skad cig skad cig 'gro ba lnga po kun //
T02D2313:253b-27: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tsher ma zug 'dra la //
T02D2313:253b-28: rus pa'i gting nas snying rje su mi skye //
T02D2313:253b-29: las ngan dbang gis 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'dir //
T02D2313:253b-30: yang yang skye zhing yang yang rga dang na //
T02D2313:253b-31: yang yang 'chi 'gyur 'di ni mi sems par //
T02D2313:253b-32: yul la chags byed bdag gis ji ltar bya//
T02D2313:253b-33: grogs dag srid pa gsum nang gnas pa kun sdug bsngal //
T02D2313:253b-34: de yang mi yi sdug bsngal bsag gis mthong //
T02D2313:253b-35: mngal gyi sdug bsngal 'di lta bur du gnas //
T02D2313:253b-36: nur nur med mer gor gor nar nar po //
T02D2313:253b-37: ltar ltar mkhrang dang rkang lag rim gyis rdzogs //
T02D2313:253b-38: nu zho mar gyis gso byed cing //
T02D2313:253b-39: shin tu nyam chung gan rkyal nyal //
T02D2313:253b-40: byis pa dar ma lang tsho dang //
T02D2313:253b-41: rgas pas slar yang byis bar 'gyur //
T02D2313:253b-42: che ni mi rtag shin tu g-yo ba ste //
T02D2313:253b-43: yud tsam sdod pa'i mthu yang yod ma yin //
T02D2313:253b-44: bdag ni nges par 'chi 'gyur mi sems pa //
T02D2313:253b-45: grogs dag skyes bu de ni ngo mtshar che //
T02D2313:253b-46: 'khor ba'i skyon dang nyes dmigs mi shes pas //
T02D2313:254a-2: bdag ni nges par 'chi 'gyur mi sems par //
T02D2313:254a-3: yul la mngon zhen nyin mchan don med 'das //
T02D2313:254a-4: 'dzam bu'i gling pa dus min 'chi bas te //
T02D2313:254a-5: nges pa can yang zad par 'gyur bas na //
T02D2313:254a-6: yang dang yang du nges par 'chi 'o zhes //
T02D2313:254a-7: bsam par rigs so kva'i bzhin bzang dag / so
T02D2313:254a-8: ga me tog rgyas pa'i dus 'di byung bar gyur
T02D2313:254a-9: // zla ba gsal bas mtshon pa'i ston dus 'di 'byung zhes //
T02D2313:254a-10: skye bo thams cad dga' 'gyur bdag gi tshe 'di ni //
T02D2313:254a-11: zad par 'gyur zhes shin tu mi dga' 'gyur ba med //
T02D2313:254a-12: de ring 'di bya sang ni 'di bya de nas 'di dang 'di bya zhes //
T02D2313:254a-13: srid pa g-yo ba'i rang bzhin ma shes don med yid brtan tshol byed pa'i //
T02D2313:254a-14: skye dgu 'chi bdag gi ni chu srin khar ni glu ni zhugs pa ltar //
T02D2313:254a-15: bya ba mthar ma phyin par yul gyi chu yi dba' klong nang du lhung //
T02D2313:254a-16: 'di ni sang bya 'di ni thang cig 'og tu bya //
T02D2313:254a-17: 'di ni de'u re bya zhes skye bo sems pa na //
T02D2313:254a-18: gshin rje be con lag thogs zur gyis lta byed cing //
T02D2313:254a-19: mig rtsa dmar khros ma rungs gad mos re snyam 'debs //
T02D2313:254a-20: rnal 'byor bstan bcos thams cad dang //
T02D2313:254a-21: sbyor ba du ma rab shes kyang //
T02D2313:254a-22: deng bya sang bya zhes smra zhing //
T02D2313:254a-24: tshe 'di gnod mang rlung gis btab pa yi //
T02D2313:254a-25: chu yi chu bur bas kyang mi rtag na //
T02D2313:254a-26: dbugs 'byung dbugs rngub gnyid kyis log pa las //
T02D2313:254a-27: sad khom gang lags de ni ngo mtshar che //
T02D2313:254a-28: kye kye kva'i grogs po dag / tshe ni yun thung shes bya'i rnam pa mang //
T02D2313:254a-29: tshe yi tshad kyang ci tsam mi shes pas //
T02D2313:254a-30: dang pas chu las 'o ma len pa ltar //
T02D2313:254a-31: rang gi 'dod pa dang la blang bar gyis //
T02D2313:254a-32: kye kye kva'i grogs po dag /'jig rten spyod pa dag la phar bltas na //
T02D2313:254a-33: byas pa thams cad don med sdug bsngal rgyu //
T02D2313:254a-34: ci la bsams kyang phan par mi 'gyur bas //
T02D2313:254a-35: rang gi sems la lta ba goms par gyis //
T02D2313:254a-36: kye kye kva'i grogs po dag / tshad ma bdun dang brda sprod rnam pa bzhi //
T02D2313:254a-37: mngon pa dang ni yo ga tsarya'i sa //
T02D2313:254a-38: mdo sde dang ni 'dul ba mngon pa dang //
T02D2313:254a-39: gzhung du bkod pa ma lus thams cad kun //
T02D2313:254a-40: ma mthong ma mnyam ma bshad ma bris zhes //
T02D2313:254a-41: de la gdung ba ma bskyed bzhin bzangs dag /
T02D2313:254b-0: @254b bla ma'i man ngag ces bya bdud rtsi'i ro //
T02D2313:254b-1: gang gis sems nyam 'jog pa de tsam zhig / yongs su bcal gyis gzhung mngas ci zhig dgos //
T02D2313:254b-2: thams cad yid ni 'khrul par byed pa'i rgyu //
T02D2313:254b-3: 'khro ba'i gnas 'di nges pa med pas na //
T02D2313:254b-4: pha ma la sogs pha mar ma nges pas //
T02D2313:254b-5: nyi du 'brel ba dag la chags pa spangs //
T02D2313:254b-6: dgra yang ma nges de la sdang ba spangs //
T02D2313:254b-7: nad med lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa dang //
T02D2313:254b-8: 'dod yon lnga la rang bzhin gyis chags spangs //
T02D2313:254b-9: rnyed pa dang ni bkur sti grags pa dang //
T02D2313:254b-10: rigs dang rus dang tshigs su bcad pa spangs //
T02D2313:254b-11: slob ma yang slob chos kyi 'brel pa spangs //
T02D2313:254b-12: kye kye kva'i grogs po dag /'jig rten stag sbrul med dang dug 'dra bar //
T02D2313:254b-13: bsams nas spangs te dben par gnas par bya //
T02D2313:254b-14: bud med mtshan nyid skyes pa'i mtshan nyid dang //
T02D2313:254b-15: sman dang glang chen brtags pa'am gza' skar rtsis //
T02D2313:254b-16: mtshon cha brtags pa'am rta dpyad rang bzo'am //
T02D2313:254b-17: bstan bcos ngan pa slob dang klog pa spangs //
T02D2313:254b-18: yul la mngon dga'i sems ni byung pa dang //
T02D2313:254b-19: rnam rtog de dag rnams ni byung ba nas //
T02D2313:254b-20: bdag ni nges par 'chi ba dran byas la //
T02D2313:254b-21: 'og nas 'byung ba'i gnyen po rnams kyis bzlog / rnam rtog mang ba dbugs bgrang ba yis gzhil //
T02D2313:254b-22: 'dod chags sems byung rnam par rtog pa de //
T02D2313:254b-23: rang bzhin mi gtsang keng rus blta bas bzlog / zhe sdang la ni byams pa'i chu yis btab //
T02D2313:254b-24: gti mug la ni rten 'brel lam gyis so //
T02D2313:254b-25: mi gtsang ba dang byams pa rten 'brel gyi //
T02D2313:254b-26: man ngag bla ma'i zhal nas 'byung bzhin bya //
T02D2313:254b-27: 'khor ba la yid ches bar 'byung bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i glu //
T02D2313:254b-28: slob dpon dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2313:254b-30: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang //
T02D2313:254b-31: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a brgya brtson seng ges bi
T02D2313:254b-32: ka ma la sh'i la'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur
T02D2313:254b-33: ba'o // slad nas bla ma de nyid dang //
